pylayers.antprop.antenna.Antenna.show3¶

Antenna.show3(self, k=0, typ='Gain', col=True)[source]¶

k : frequency index

typ = ‘Gain’
= ‘Ftheta’ = ‘Fphi’

if col -> color coded plot3D else -> simple plot3D
